    • convert

      public abstract byte[] convert(List<IBaseDataObject> list, Map<String,Object> params) throws IOException
      Method to convert payload(s) to an output type
      Parameters:
      list - the payload list
      params - the list of parameters
      Returns:
      the byte representation of the payload(s)
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue outputting the data

    • initialize

      public void initialize(Configurator theConfigG, String filterName, Configurator theFilterConfig)
      Initialization phase hook for the filter with provided filter configuration
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface IDropOffFilter
      Overrides:
      initialize in class AbstractFilter
      Parameters:
      theConfigG - passed in configuration object, usually DropOff's config
      filterName - the configured name of this filter or null for the default
      theFilterConfig - the configuration for the specific filter

    • createRollable

      protected IJournaler createRollable() throws IOException, InterruptedException
      Create the rollable resource
      Returns:
      the specific journaled coalescer for the filter
      Throws:
      IOException - if there is an issue with the output path
      InterruptedException - if the journal is interrupted

    • createRoller

      protected Roller createRoller()
      Create the object to manage the state of the roll
      Returns:
      the roller object
